html: Sin. Towards the end of the world iniquity will abound, and men shall rage against each other, Matthew xxiv. (Worthington)— They will also feel the effects of sin.—Mad: abandoned to their passions, (Deuteronomy xxviii. 28.) excepting only the elect. (Menochius)—Few. The Chaldeans permitted only a few of the poorest sort to remain, 2 Paralipomenon xxix. 10.
